column1: Smoque BBQ//// I want to give this place 5 stars
column2: but I don't go often to BBQ restaurants so I don't have much to compare it to. I used to eat normal chicago bbq... but now
column3: I'll never go back! This place is meat heaven. Please remember
column4: its best to take it home
column5: I've never been able to eat there without getting elbowed in the ribs or get my hands stuck to the sticky table.
